TEXT.TITLE: HOG AND CATTLE SLAUGHTER GUESSTIMATES
TEXT.BODY: Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 250,000 to 270,000 head versus 249,000 week ago and 261,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 126,000 to 131,000 head versus 126,000 week ago and 131,000 a year ago. Reuter
